page.title: 07Education In Kingswood.
page.content: In this densely populated area there are 13{schools.}The{oldest}Primary School,built in 1870, is at Mangotsfield. The{newest,}built in 1966 and 1967, are called Deerswood Tynings and Falconride School.Most {Primary Schools}now admit children before their fifth birthday. The two large{Secondary Schools}called Stockwell and Mangotsfield have over 1000 pupils. Pupils transfer at the age of 11+. The school{population}has fallen steadily since 1974 and classrooms have been closed and schools amalgamated. Most classes have 30 or more pupils. The{Technical College}at Soundwell provides{Tertiary Education}for students of 16+. The{courses}include Engineering,Business Studies and Catering and various{Evening Classes.
